front.title: MT-OSPF: Multi Topology (MT) Routing in OSPF

abstract.t: This draft describes the extension to OSPF in order to define independent IP topologies called Multi-Topologies (MTs). The MT extension can be used for computing different paths for different classes of service, in-band management network or incongruent topologies for unicast and multicast. M-ISIS describes a similar mechanism for ISIS. This draft also describes an optional extension of Multi-topologies whereby some links might be excluded from the default topology.
